descriptions.pythonPcep: Earned the PCEP (Python Certified Entry-Level Programmer) certification, demonstrating foundational knowledge of Python programming.
descriptions.udemyPythonBootcamp: Completed the "100 Days of Code - The Complete Python Pro Bootcamp," mastering Python from beginner to advanced levels.
descriptions.metaFrontend: Completed the "Introduction to Frontend Development" course, gaining foundational skills in HTML, CSS.
descriptions.udemyHtmlCss: Completed the course, learning the fundamentals of HTML and CSS to build and deploy a website.
descriptions.gitGithubBootcamp: Completed a comprehensive Git and GitHub course, covering version control, branching, and collaboration workflows.
descriptions.fullStackWebDev: Frontend and Backend Web Development course, covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, and React.
descriptions.kiKompetenzSchulung: AI Competence Training according to Article 4 of the EU AI Act, covering responsible AI usage and compliance.

Projects.title: My Projects

descriptions.portfolioWebsite: A modern, responsive portfolio website built with Next.js 15, featuring dark/light theme toggle, smooth animations with Framer Motion, and optimized performance. Includes TypeScript for type safety and Tailwind CSS for styling.
descriptions.berichHub: Full-stack digital learning platform with user authentication, Profile pages, and Blog features. AI integration for personalized learning. Completely free and open-source. 4 different languages supported: English, German, Spanish, Swedish.
descriptions.llmAgent: Local ollama-based AI chatbot, customizable to use any LLM model, any Embed model, 2 Options for Vector DB; local postgres or DataStax Astra. Can read web pages, and answer questions based on the content. More coming soon.. Open source.
descriptions.subsApi: API for managing user subscriptions, including features for billing, invoicing, and payment processing. Built with Next.js and integrated with Stripe for secure payments.

Projects.noProjectsFound: No projects found in this category.

services.title: Third-Party Services
services.chatbotDescription: This website includes an AI chatbot powered by Google's Gemini API. By using the chatbot, you automatically accept Google's terms of service, privacy policy, and other legal agreements as provided by Google.
services.googleTermsDescription: Chat interactions are processed by Google's services. I do not save any chat conversations or personal information from chatbot interactions.

Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.subtitle: How I handle your data and privacy

overview.title: Overview
overview.description: This privacy policy explains how this personal portfolio handles your data. As a private, non-commercial website, I collect minimal information and prioritize your privacy.
overview.keyPointDescription: I don't collect, store, or sell your personal data. Everything is designed with privacy in mind.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Language preference and theme settings stored locally in your browser. Required for website functionality.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Privacy-friendly Vercel Analytics and Speed Insights to monitor website performance. No personal data is tracked or stored.

dataProcessing.title: Data Processing
dataProcessing.description: This website processes minimal data to provide functionality. All processing is done client-side in your browser or through privacy-compliant services.
dataProcessing.vercelDescription: These services collect anonymous performance metrics to help improve the website. No personal information is collected or stored.

chatbot.title: AI Chatbot Service
chatbot.description: This website includes an AI chatbot powered by Google's Gemini API for interactive assistance and information.
chatbot.geminiDescription: By using the chatbot, you automatically accept Google's terms of service, privacy policy, and data processing terms as provided by Google. Chat data is processed by Google's services according to their privacy policies.
chatbot.temporaryDescription: I do not save any chat conversations or personal information. All chat data is temporarily stored in your browser's local storage and is automatically deleted when you refresh the page or close your browser.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: You have full control over your data and privacy on this website:
rights.clearCookies: Clear your browser cookies anytime to reset preferences
rights.disableAnalytics: Use cookie banner to disable analytics tracking
rights.contact: Contact us if you have questions about your privacy

About.mainStory: I'm currently an intern at Avarno GmbH, where I've built everything from bespoke digital solutions to AI-powered applications. I specialize in Next.js, React, JavaScript, HTML/CSS and maintain an active presence on GitHub. When tackling new challenges, I dive straight into the docs and experiment until I've mastered the tools. Driven by a passion for a cleaner, more open web, I contribute to open-source projects and aim to streamline user experiences free of unnecessary ads and paywalls. My goal is to grow into a full-stack expert‚Äîparticularly in Next.js, LLM integrations, and end-to-end web application development. I believe hard work and discipline always pay off, and I bring that focus to every project, big or small.

sections.philosophy: I believe in writing code that not only works but is maintainable, scalable, and accessible. My approach combines technical excellence with user-centered design principles. I'm passionate about creating web experiences that are fast, intuitive, and free from unnecessary complexity.

PortfolioAbout.title: About This Portfolio
PortfolioAbout.description: This is not just a portfolio - this is my developer journey visualized into a full-stack application. It's not meant to be 'finished' because it evolves with me, growing and changing as I advance in my career. Built with enterprise-grade architecture and cutting-edge technologies, it will always be updated and will always grow.
